channel.title: influxdb on Samson Gama

item.title: Millions of Inserts | The ideal database?
item.description: Disclaimer: I haven’t ran any benchmarks or ran any of these databases in HA mode for proof of concepts but this was my experience with trying to work with lots of data for my HFT Trading Bot. The Data: (all indexed on time) - 1 minute candle: {timestamp, instrument, high, low, open close, volume, trades}, 1 inserts per minute - Individual trade: {timestamp, instrument, price, side, type}, 0-2000 inserts per minute
